ACCOUNT_REFERENCE.TITLE: Accounts References Values
ACCOUNT_REFERENCE.DESCRIPTION: Show debit, credit and balance of the defined group of accounts known as accounts references

AGED_CREDITORS.TITLE: Aged Creditors
AGED_CREDITORS.DESCRIPTION: This report displays all receivables owed to creditors by period.

AGED_DEBTORS.TITLE: Aged Debtors
AGED_DEBTORS.DESCRIPTION: This report show all the debts of the clients, while specifying the debts per period

BALANCE_SHEET.TITLE: Balance Sheet
BALANCE_SHEET.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the balance sheet of the enterprise

CASHFLOW_BY_SERVICE.TITLE: Cash flow By Service
CASHFLOW_BY_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the changes in the accounts and revenues of the balance sheet on cash by Services

CASHFLOW.TITLE: Cash Flow Physical Report
CASHFLOW.DESCRIPTION: This report shows changes in the accounts and revenues of the balance sheet on cash

CLIENTS_REPORT.TITLE: Clients Report
CLIENTS_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: This report displays all the debtor groups, their account balances at the beginning of the fiscal year, the current balances, and their ending balances.

EMPLOYEE_STANDING.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the financial situation of an employee
EMPLOYEE_STANDING.TITLE: Employee Standing Report

OPEN_DEBTORS.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the debtors that have a standing debt with the institution, and gives some control over the sort order.  For advanced analysis, the report can add in the last invoice date and last payment date, as well as limit the scope of the search by a date.
OPEN_DEBTORS.TITLE: Debtors with Unpaid Debts
OPEN_DEBTORS.DATE_LIMIT_HELP: The date limit will only scan records from this date to the present.
OPEN_DEBTORS.SHOW_DETAILED_VIEW: Include Columns for Last Dates of Invoicing and Payment
OPEN_DEBTORS.SHOW_DETAILED_VIEW_HELP: Enabling this option will include the last date the debtor paid and the last date they were invoiced.  This is useful for understanding when they were at the institution.  However, it will make the query take slightly longer.
OPEN_DEBTORS.SHOW_UNVERIFIED_TRANSACTIONS_HELP: Enabling this option includes records from the Journal which have not been audited by the accountant as well as records from the General Ledger the accountant has verified.  This view must be treated as a projection until the accountant has approved the Journal transactions and moved them to the General Ledger.

PATIENT_STANDING.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the financial situation of a patient
PATIENT_STANDING.TITLE: Patient Standing Report

REPORT_ACCOUNTS.TITLE: Account Report
REPORT_ACCOUNTS.DESCRIPTION: This report shows all transactions for an individual account given a set time period.
REPORT_ACCOUNTS.WARN_MULTIPLE: N.B. This report concerns an income/ expense account and spans multiple fiscal years. Income/ expense accounts are cleared to 0 at the beginning of every fiscal year, the cumulative balance displayed is for the transactions within this period of time. It is recommended to use this statement within a single fiscal year.
REPORT_ACCOUNTS.WARN_CURRENCY: Attention! You are using a currency other than the enterprise currency.  Values on this report are subject to change with changes to the exchange rate and should not be considered final.  Please save a report in the enterprise currency for long term reference.

INCOME_EXPENSE_REPORT.TITLE: Income Expense Report
INCOME_EXPENSE_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: Show the list of incomes and expenses accured inside the enterprise

BALANCE_REPORT.TITLE: Balance Report
BALANCE_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the balance of accounts for a given period

REPORT_INCOME_EXPENSE.TITLE: Income Expense Report
REPORT_INCOME_EXPENSE.DESCRIPTION: This report shows all incomes and expenses of the enterprise

CASH_REPORT.TITLE: Cash Report
CASH_REPORT.DESCRIPTION: This report shows all entries and exits of cash inside the enterprise

STOCK.TITLE: Stock Report
STOCK.DESCRIPTION: This report shows the stock of products, their average consumption and their status.
STOCK.INVENTORY_REPORT_DESCRIPTION: This report shows all movements of a product and its stock status and value.
STOCK.EXIT_REPORT_DESCRIPTION: This report shows stocks exit which had occured in different depots
STOCK.INCLUDE_DEPOT_EXIT: Include stock exit to other depots

UTIL.EMAIL_HELP_TXT: The email above will receive the report as an attachment.  The server must have an internet connection for the email to be successfully delivered.

OPTIONS.HIDE_TITLE_ACCOUNT_HELP: If yes, the report will not contain title accounts
OPTIONS.USE_ORIGINAL_TRANSACTION_CURRENCY_HELP: If yes, the report will show the recorded currency of the transaction instead of the value in the enterprise's currency.
OPTIONS.TOTALS_CURRENCY_HELP: This options lets you view the totals in the selected currency by exchanging the totals into the selected currency using today's exchange rate.
OPTIONS.SEPARATE_DEBITS_AND_CREDITS_HELP: This option breaks out columns from a single positive or negative balance into two columns representing debits and credits.
OPTIONS.REMOVE_ZERO_ROWS_HELP: This option will remove rows that do not have any data in them.  Produces a more compact output.
